Plot: The Taylor family is devastated by an accident that takes place on the day their matriarch is due to graduate from college -- decades after leaving to raise her children.
Title: Fireflies in the Garden
Actors: Ryan Reynolds, Willem Dafoe, Emily Watson, Carrie-Anne Moss
tomatoConsensus: Despite boasting a stellar cast, Fireflies in the Garden is just tedious, dull and predictable melodrama. Instantly forgettable.
